price: 101. Ils (le porteront) éternellement, et quel horrible fardeau ils porteront au Jour de la Résurrection !
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهِۖ وَسَآءَ لَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ حِمۡلٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhi wasāa lahum yawma al-qiyāmati ḥim'lan
